metadata.description: The Business app owner to contact.
Tag value: Business App owner's email. Example: name@cevt.se
Provides information on department or team is responsible for administering/supporting the application.
Tag value: Team name/department. Example: Infrastructure Operation
Provides information on what the resource group is used for (useful for maintenance, policy enforcement, chargeback, etc.)
Tag value: Dev, QA, Stage, Test, Prod. Example: Prod
Provides information on which application this resource is used to run.
Tag value: Application name. Example: Odoo
